project_abstract.cdata: This project paper concerns a first order restructuring to the Peru Institutional Capacity for Sustainable Fiscal Decentralization Project, to introduce the following changes in the project and any accompanying amendments to the legal documents: (i) an adjustment of the scope of the project following a partial cancellation request of $2.16 million received from the Borrower on April 14, 2008; (ii) a consequent revision of the outcome indicators and the monitoring and evaluation framework as well as a slight revision of the project development objective (PDO) to include the central Government within the activities of the project; (iii) a project closing date extension to September 30, 2010 to allow the completion of the activities supported by the loan; and (iv) adjustments to the institutional arrangements in the project's operational manual to take into consideration organizational changes in one of the six sub-executing units. The restructuring aims to respond to the evolving Borrower's needs and priorities in the area of fiscal decentralization. The project has suffered significant implementation delays, due in part to the change in administration shortly after the project was approved, and specifically to the process of adjusting the project activities to the priorities of the new administration.
